content: this legal text summarizes a court case involving the dissolution of a real estate property owned by multiple parties the court has declared the dissolution and assigned specific portions of the property to each party involved the defendants have been ordered to pay a sum of money to the plaintiffs as compensation however the plaintiffs claim for additional compensation and reimbursement of expenses has been rejected the court has divided the costs of the court proceedings equally between the parties various articles of the civil code and other laws have been referred to in the courts decision the court has considered the condition value possession and use of the property in determining the division a horizontal division of the property has been deemed the most appropriate solution the estimated value of the property and the specified compensation to be paid have been mentioned the court has also addressed the issue of existing easements and expenses related to the property the decision is binding on the parties involved and the costs of the court proceedings have been determined the ruling was made on january 26 2021 and filed with the registry on february 9 2021
